aboutUs.title: About GameCompass
aboutUs.description: Discover new blockbusters, indie highlights and timeless classics – fast, secure and uncomplicated. With us you will definitely find the right game for you.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to build a vibrant community where trading games is simple, transparent and accessible to everyone. We believe that access to games should be just as entertaining and smooth as playing them.

features.title: What makes us special
features.security: Secure transactions: Buyer & seller protection included
features.usability: Easy operation: Intuitive user interface & modern shop

values.title: Our Values
values.fairness: Fairness: Transparent prices and fair conditions for everyone
values.reliability: Reliability: Technical support and secure payment
values.passion: Passion: We love games and live gaming culture
values.innovation: Innovation: Continuous development for the best user experience

team.title: Team & Development
team.description: Behind GameCompass is a young, dynamic team with gaming background. We are constantly working to improve the platform – for dealers, buyers and the entire gaming world.

vision.title: Future & Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to make GameCompass the leading platform for digital and physical game trading – global, sustainable and user-oriented.

sell.title: Sell your games quickly and easily!
sell.description: Got games you no longer play? Use our marketplace to sell them and make other gamers happy.
